    STANDARD_PLUS performance improves

    Due to recent improvements in output buffer code, STANDARD_PLUS audio mode is now the default, and performs as well as the old STANDARD mode, while removing the high-pitched PWM carrier frequency whine out of hearing range.

    Categories: audio, updates

    Updated: April 20, 2014
